      Trace for GameEntities in the scene that are intersected by a line segment that is defined by the given ray defined by the origin(originX,originY) and the direction(directionX, directionY) and extends the given distance (length of the distance form the origin to the other point of the line).

      • circleTrace

        public boolean circleTrace(GameEntity tracer,
                           vine.math.vector.Vec2f center,
                           float radius,
                           TraceResult result)
        Trace for GameEntities in the Scene in the area defined by the circle defined by the given center and radius.
        Parameters:
        tracer - A GameEntity that is ignored when tracing.
        center - The center of the circle that is used to trace.
        radius - The radius of the circle that is used to trace.
        result - Used to store detailed results of the trace
        Returns:
        True, if there was at least one hit.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if result is null

      • multiCircleTrace

        public boolean multiCircleTrace(GameEntity tracer,
                                vine.math.vector.Vec2f center,
                                float radius,
                                MultiTraceResult result)
                         throws java.lang.NullPointerException
        Trace for GameEntities in the Scene in the area defined by the circle defined by the given center and radius.
        Parameters:
        tracer - A GameEntity that is ignored when tracing.
        center - The center of the circle that is used to trace.
        radius - The radius of the circle that is used to trace.
        result - Used to store detailed results of the trace
        Returns:
        True, if there was at least one hit.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if result is null

      • rayTrace

        public boolean rayTrace(GameEntity tracer,
                        boolean ignoreSelf,
                        vine.math.vector.Vec2f origin,
                        vine.math.vector.Vec2f direction,
                        float distance,
                        TraceResult result)

      • rayTrace

        public boolean rayTrace(GameEntity tracer,
                        float originX,
                        float originY,
                        float directionX,
                        float directionY,
                        float distance,
                        TraceResult result)
                 throws java.lang.NullPointerException
        Trace for GameEntities in the scene that are intersected by a line segment that is defined by the given ray defined by the origin(originX,originY) and the direction(directionX, directionY) and extends the given distance (length of the distance form the origin to the other point of the line).
        Parameters:
        tracer - A GameEntity that is ignored when tracing.
        originX - The x coordinate of the ray origin.
        originY - The y coordinate of the ray origin.
        directionX - The x coordinate of the ray direction.
        directionY - The y coordinate of the ray direction.
        distance - Defines the length of the ray in which entities are hit.
        result - Used to store detailed results of the trace
        Returns:
        True, if there was at least one hit.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if result == null

      • multiRayTrace

        public boolean multiRayTrace(GameEntity tracer,
                             boolean ignoreSelf,
                             vine.math.vector.Vec2f origin,
                             vine.math.vector.Vec2f direction,
                             float distance,
                             TraceResult result)

      • multiRayTrace

        public boolean multiRayTrace(GameEntity tracer,
                             float originX,
                             float originY,
                             float directionX,
                             float directionY,
                             float distance,
                             MultiTraceResult result)
                      throws java.lang.NullPointerException
        Trace for GameEntities in the scene that are intersected by a line segment that is defined by the given ray defined by the origin(originX,originY) and the direction(directionX, directionY) and extends the given distance (length of the distance form the origin to the other point of the line).
        Parameters:
        tracer - A GameEntity that is ignored when tracing.
        originX - The x coordinate of the ray origin.
        originY - The y coordinate of the ray origin.
        directionX - The x coordinate of the ray direction.
        directionY - The y coordinate of the ray direction.
        distance - Defines the length of the ray in which entities are hit.
        result - Used to store detailed results of the trace
        Returns:
        True, if there was at least one hit.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if result == null
